message.name: ERR_XFV_REQUESTDATE_EARLIER_THAN_APPLICATION_FILING_DATE
message.locale: The request date of this program must not be earlier than the application filing date.

message.name: ERR_REOPEN_MAX_TIMES_EXCEEDED
message.locale: Unable to reopen this program application as the max number of times allowed has been exceeded.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ALREADY_DENIED
message.locale: The program application is already in a status of Denied

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ALREADY_APPROVED
message.locale: The program application is already in a status of Approved.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_MUST_BE_PENDING
message.locale: The program application must be in a status of Pending.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_DENIED_INTAKE_APP_MUST_READY_FOR_DETERMINATION
message.locale: A program application can only be set to a status of Denied when the intake application is in a status of Ready for Determination.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_APPROVED_INTAKE_APP_MUST_READY_FOR_DETERMINATION
message.locale: A program application can only be set to a status of Approved when the intake application is in a status of Ready for Determination.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_WITHDRAWAL_DATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_REQUESTED_DATE
message.locale: A program application withdrawal date must be on or after program requested date.

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TO_ADD_PROGRAM_TO_APPLICATION_WITH_CURRENT_STATUS
message.locale: A program can only be added to an application that is in a state of Submitted or Ready for Determination.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_WITHDRAWAL_DATE_MUST_NOT_BE_AFTER_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: A program application withdrawal date can not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_PROGRAM_APPLICATION_ALREADY_EXISTING
message.locale: This program has already been requested on the application.
